mapper.select: SELECT manage_no,owner,location,info,reg_dt,use_yn FROM fmanage order by reg_dt desc

select fh.history_no history_no,fm.manage_no,fm.location,usr.user_nm owner,fm.info ,cod.code_nm item_code,mse.msr_nm use_yn from fhistory fh, fmanage fm,msrequip mse,users usr,codes cod where fh.release_dt > sysdate and mse.msr_code = fh.msr_code and fm.owner = usr.user_id and fm.manage_no = fh.manage_no and cod.code_no = fm.item_code and fm.manage_no = #{manage_no}

select mse.msr_reg_dt ,mse.msr_temp ,mse.msr_humid ,mse.msr_bright from mserec mse,fhistory fh where mse.msr_reg_dt = (select max(ms.msr_reg_dt) msr_reg_dt from mserec ms, fhistory fh where ms.msr_code = fh.msr_code and fh.manage_no = #{manage_no}) and mse.msr_code = fh.msr_code and fh.history_no = #{history_no}

select fm.manage_no msr_code,ms.MSR_NM from fmanage fm , fhistory fh, MSREQUIP ms where fm.manage_no = fh.manage_no and fm.owner = #{owner} and fh.use_yn = 'Y' and fh.MSR_CODE = ms.MSR_CODE order by fm.manage_no desc

select fh.history_no history_no,fm.manage_no,fm.location,usr.user_nm owner, cod.code_nm item_code,mse.msr_nm msr_nm, ms.msr_reg_dt reg_dt,ms.msr_temp ,ms.msr_humid,ms.msr_bright from fhistory fh, fmanage fm,msrequip mse,users usr,codes cod, mserec ms where fh.release_dt > sysdate and mse.msr_code = fh.msr_code and fm.owner = usr.user_id and fm.manage_no = fh.manage_no and cod.code_no = fm.item_code and ms.msr_code = fh.msr_code and fh.manage_no = #{manage_no} and ms.msr_reg_dt = (select max(ms.msr_reg_dt) msr_reg_dt from mserec ms,fhistory fh where ms.msr_code = fh.msr_code and fh.manage_no = #{manage_no}) and ms.msr_code = fh.msr_code

select round(avg(nvl(ms.msr_temp, 0))) msr_temp, round(avg(nvl(ms.msr_humid, 0))) msr_humid, round(avg(nvl(ms.msr_bright , 0))) msr_bright from fmanage fm ,fhistory fh, mserec ms where fm.manage_no = fh.manage_no and fh.msr_code = ms.msr_code and fm.manage_no = #{manage_no} and ms.msr_reg_dt < sysdate -${number} and ms.msr_reg_dt > sysdate -${number}-1

select count(*) from msrequip ms,fhistory fh,fmanage fm where ms.msr_code = fh.msr_code and fh.manage_no = fm.manage_no and ms.owner = #{owner} and ms.msr_code = #{msr_code} and fh.use_yn = 'Y' and ms.USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: update fmanage set location = #{location}, info = #{info},item_code = #{item_code} where manage_no = #{manage_no}
update fmanage set use_yn = 'N' where manage_no = #{manage_no}
update fhistory set release_dt = sysdate ,use_yn = 'N' where manage_no = #{manage_no}
